column5: The translation industry is on the rise and specialist translators are highly sought after.The integration of business knowledge and translation/interpreting skills will give you a competitive edge in the job market, opening up a broader range of career opportunities.Through the skill-focused and practical nature of the course, you'll gain invaluable industry experience and proficiency in translation and interpreting, which will potentially enhance your employability.Our lecturers have a wide range of practical and research experience in translation and interpreting.The practical translation and interpreting sessions will include industry-based tasks.
